FIRST_NAME.PATTERN: Only letters are accepted here. Do not include special characters

LAST_NAME.PATTERN: Only letters are accepted here. Do not include special characters

BIRTH_DATE.OLDER_THAN: You must be over 18 years old

CPF.PATTERN: Your CPF is not valid must be 11 numbers

EMAIL.PATTERN: Your email is not valid. Maybe it's misspelled

PASSWORD.MIN_LENGTH: Your password must have at least 6 characters

PASSWORD_VERIFICATION.REQUIRED: You must enter your password again

INTERESTS.REQUIRED: You must accept at least one interest

ACCEPT_TERMS.REQUIRED: You must agree to terms and conditions

RECOVER_PASSWORD.TITLE: Recover password
RECOVER_PASSWORD.INSTRUCTIONS: Enter your email, we will send you a link so you can reset your password.
RECOVER_PASSWORD.EMAIL_SENT_TEXT: We have sent a link to your email to create a new password

USER_UNDER_LEGAL_AGE.TITLE: ¡You are a minor! 😮
USER_UNDER_LEGAL_AGE.MESSAGE: You must be 18 years or older to be part of Tap it  ¡We wait for you when you have them!

TOO_MANY_FAILED_ATTEMPTS.TITLE: Authentication Error
TOO_MANY_FAILED_ATTEMPTS.MESSAGE: Too many failed attempts. Please try again later.

WRONG_PASSWORD.TITLE: Authentication Error
WRONG_PASSWORD.MESSAGE: The password is not correct or the user does not exist

USER_NOT_FOUND.TITLE: Authentication Error
USER_NOT_FOUND.MESSAGE: There is no user record with this identify. The user may have been removed.

SIGN_UP_EMAIL_ALREADY_IN_USE.TITLE: Authentication Error
SIGN_UP_EMAIL_ALREADY_IN_USE.MESSAGE:
The email address is in use by another account. 
Is it possible that you are already registered?

USER_CANCELLED.TITLE: Authentication Error
USER_CANCELLED.MESSAGE: You must authorize the use of your data in the popup window.

REQUIRED_EMAIL.TITLE: Authentication Error
REQUIRED_EMAIL.MESSAGE: You must authorize the use of your email.

FACEBOOK_REQUIRED_PUBLIC_PROFILE.TITLE: Authentication Error
FACEBOOK_REQUIRED_PUBLIC_PROFILE.MESSAGE: You must authorize the use of your public profile.

REQUIRED_BIRTHDAY.TITLE: Authentication Error
REQUIRED_BIRTHDAY.MESSAGE: You must authorize the use of your birthday.

INCOMPLETE_BIRTHDAY.TITLE: Authentication Error
INCOMPLETE_BIRTHDAY.MESSAGE: Your birthday is incomplete on your provider account.

SIGN_UP_IN_WRONG_TAB.TITLE: Authentication Error
SIGN_UP_IN_WRONG_TAB.MESSAGE: Please sign up in the sign up tab.

ACCOUNT_EXISTS_WITH_DIFFERENT_CREDENTIAL.TITLE: Authentication Error
ACCOUNT_EXISTS_WITH_DIFFERENT_CREDENTIAL.MESSAGE: You have already registered with this email {{email}}! Do not you remember your password? Get it back!
